actionConfiguration.body:
select
	app_id,
	a.name as appName,
	t.name as WorkspaceName,
	(sum(m.message_tokens) + sum(m.answer_tokens)) as token_count,
   sum(m.total_price) as total_price
from
	messages m
join 
    apps a
on
	m.app_id = a.id
join 
    tenants t 
on
	a.tenant_id = t.id
group by
	t.name,
	app_id,
	a.name
order by
	token_count desc
LIMIT 20;
